qas.question: Madonna was born to which religion?
Where were Madonna's paternal grandparents come from?
Madonna's mother was from which ancestry?
What was Madonna's nickname when she was younger?

context: Madonna was born to <a0_0>Catholic<a0_0/> parents Silvio Anthony "Tony" Ciccone (b. 1931) and Madonna Louise Fortin (c. 1933 – December 1, 1963) in Bay City, Michigan, on August 16, 1958. Her father's parents were immigrants from <a1_0>Pacentro, Italy<a1_0/>, while her mother was of <a2_0>French-Canadian<a2_0/> ancestry. Tony worked as an <a3_0>engineer designer<a3_0/> for Chrysler and General Motors. Since Madonna had the same name as her mother, family members called her "<a4_0>Little Nonni<a4_0/>". She has two elder brothers, Anthony (born 1956) and Martin (born 1957), and three younger siblings, Paula (born 1959), Christopher (born 1960), and Melanie (born 1962).
